item.title: Firefox Monitor
item.description: I have always preferred Firefox due to their approach to privacy as well as providing a viable alternative to Google backed Chromium/Chrome. Recently I also started using Thunderbird for Gmail (slowly trying to switch to ProtonMail). I couldnâ€™t figure out why Gmail on Firefox for Linux with my extensions make the Gmail web client crawl. Coming to Firefox Monitor. It’s an online service to see if an account has been part of any public data breach.
